column6: BORN IN BLOOD PART 4 With Nuke out of the way, Logan continues to cut a bloody path towards vengeance. But now he must face one of his oldest allies, and this super-soldier won't be defeated so easily
column8: | penciller:Steve Dillon | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Dan Kemp | penciller (cover):Joe Quesada | writer:Daniel Way
